# ATACH2

# Create function to paste together string of FORMxx.txt
atach.import <- function(y) {
  dataset <- paste0("atach2",".",y)
  filepath <- paste0("./ATACH2/FORM",y,".txt")
  dataset <- read.table(filepath, sep = "\t", header = TRUE)
}
